actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the whale can't bite another target and it has advantage on bite attacks against the creature it is grappling.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The whale can't use blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The whale has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.
